taskDescription: Suppose that a Graph M is a complete graph and Graph N is the complement of M. What are the degrees of the vertices of Graph N? How do you know?
detailedSolution: The degrees are 0. There are no adjacent vertices in Graph N since all vertices are adjacent in Graph M.
